string.name: name
string.value: Mana Reflection (Reworked)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Self Buff: 1000s] \nBy drawing an incredible inner strength, enables one to reverse the flow of Mana back to the monster, returning the damage received from the monster. The returned damage cannot exceed 20% of maxHP of the monster.\n[Mastery Bonus: 10% reflect chance]

[Mastery Bonus : Damage Increased]
